column2: "...This castle is so different from Cuent's. It's got such a unique style."
"It's not like we have the resources to build something so extravagant. Wouldn't that just be a waste?"
"The palace was built for myself, after all, so I had it constructed by unoccupied citizens. Feel free to admire my benevolence as we walk."
"I have been awaiting your return, Your Divine Grace, Margareta."
"Huh? Aren't you..."
"I went through painstaking efforts just to give Your Divine Grace the chance to enjoy herself... Pray tell, was it to your liking?"
"Still, it was wholly unexpected that you would rush to Cuent for help. Even more so that they would honor your request."
"...Who were you again?"
"H-How could you forget your royal priest?! The one who taught you how to perform the summoning, that was me!"
"...Guess you can't actually keep up the fancy speech after all. I always knew you weren't much of a smooth talker."
"Of course I haven't forgotten. Were you hoping that God forgives traitors? It's your name that I can't remember."
"Hah! Really now, I can't tell if you're a genius or just an idiot. I suppose it's more entertaining that way, yes?"
"...You were in Verun!"
"So? Why did you return? Have you come to offer yourself up and surrender?"

"Not at all. This play is still missing something, so
I'm here to give it a push in the right direction."
"Hmmm. So you still plan on committing more evil acts? In the royal palace of the Divine Queen, Margareta?"
"You should be well aware that within these walls, my capabilities are limitless."
"Margareta of Epic hereby decrees, that this room shall be your grave."
"Gah?!"
"Now, feast."
"W-What was that...?"
"Heavenly arts passed down in Epic. The power of miracles, given form through tireless devotion."
"Although, it can only be used here in the palace, and it's kind of gross-looking."
"Then, you would have been fine as long as you stayed here?"
"What good would it have been if I alone were kept safe? Should I have just let my country fall?"
"More importantly, you two have to be to sent home. They just need to be in the same spot they were summoned, and use the same spell, right?"
"Oh, yes! That is correct."
"Then come on over here. Don't worry, so long as you don't commit any sins, I can't call upon that power again."
"Alright, let's get this over with..."
"Checkmate, fool."
"Wh-what the?!"
"That's Ephimera...!"
"How careless of you, Divine Queen Margareta. Didn't I say I was here to move things along?"
"Killing me was the final push. The final push needed to take full control, see?"
"Your body will become an offering to a higher power. To receive...their gift."
"Ah! This is bad...! Screw it, this is all I can do! Go, return!"
"My body is...disappearing?!"
"Stop it, Divine Moron! You should be protecting yourself, not us! You moron!"
"Enough insolence! You can't die! I have an obligation to see you two off! Hurry up and go...home!"
"Lady Margareta!"
"Stay back, Queen of Cuent! You can't do anything about it now! Once it's started, there's no stopping it!"
"Just this once, I'll surrender! And be saved by a Guardian! Doesn't that sound right out of a storybook?"
"Why are you still hung up on that?!"
"Quiet, fairy! The reality is that I'm scared stiff, so just let me act cool for once!"
"I don't want to drag this out any longer, so I'm just going to give in and leave the rest to you... So you must save me! You absolutely must!"
"...You can count on me!"
"I'll make it as painless as possible!"
"Phew...Not bad at all, I say. The body has gone through quite the exquisite preparation. This new vessel of mine should serve magnificently."
"Readings, confirmed... There's no mistaking it. That's Dark Falz [Apprentice]!"
"What's this? Has this splendid assortment of playthings been gathered here just for me?"
"It's been ages since I've felt so alive... Won't you help me test this wonderful new power?"
"These readings are [Apprentice]'s, but... the parameters are nothing like normal!"
"If we have to deal with Marge's power in addition to [Apprentice]'s, our chance of winning is..."
"Even so, we can't back down."
"I promised I'd save her."
"...Yes, that's exactly right. We must save Lady Margareta...!"
"Noooooooo! What is the meaning of this?!"
"Hideous! Tasteless! Sickening enough to scream! There's no way! This can't possibly be my true self, no way!"
"...E-Excuuuuse me?! How dare you speak in such a manner when faced with the pinnacle of beauty, you underdeveloped larva!"
"Shut up, shut up, shut up! Just hearing you speak is enough to make me dread becoming you!"
"Tch, a vessel should not speak! Know your place!"
"A queen's place is wherever she pleases! Are you really me?! You're way too dim-witted to be!"
"Close your mouth and receive your beating from the Guardian, without uttering another word!"
"For the sake of the world and all the people and my country and our God, but most of all for me!"
"She's still just as loud as ever even though she's being possessed... I guess Marge will always be Marge."
"Of course I will! Just who do you think you're talking about?! I am the great Divine Queen Margareta!"
"Only I may wield the holy power and do as I please with this country! Nobody else is allowed to!"
"And I absolutely will not accept that this... creature... is what I will look like in the future...!"
"So win! Guardian! Tear her to shreds, rip her to pieces!"
"Just leave it to me!"
"I'll make it as painful as possible!"
"I will!"
"That's not what you said earlier! Oh whatever, just do it!"

"...Just how long do you intend to make light of
me?!"
"Royal Priest"
